translations: adv.决不，丝毫没有；不舒服地，混乱地

phrs.translation: 绝不, 失态地, 毫不

sentences.sentence: We could nohow make out his handwriting.
sentences.translation: 我们无法辨认出他的笔迹。

sentences.sentence: So nowadays, my attitude has been changing, I've not expected to others can read my mind nohow.
sentences.translation: 现在，我的看法有所改变，我不再期待别人能够读懂我！
